name: Flying Game (2018)
description:
Created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018 - theme: Transmission.

The idea came from combining the city gliding in Batman: Arkham Knight (Rocksteady, 2015) with the idea of delivering things from Crazy Taxi (SEGA, 1999). The game's thematic and aesthetic qualities were inspired by the film Kiki's Delivery Service (Studio Ghibli, 1989).

Credits

  • Adam Thompson
  • Cameron Peet
  • Joe Chang
